Test Piece Contest
Hiawatha [Coleridge-Taylor arr. Godfrey]
Blaenau Ffestiniog, Gwynedd, Wales, UK March contest - 1st Llandudno Town, 2nd Nantlle Vale. Prizes - 1st £25, 2nd £10. 5 bands competed.
Nov. 5, 2018, 3:53 p.m. Feb. 26, 2021, 2:02 p.m.
1 Royal Oakeley Band William Halliwell
2 Dyffryn Nantlle Band J. E. Fidler
3 Llandudno Band Francis Lucio Traversi
4 Connah's Quay Silver J. A. Hughes
5 Cynfi Unknown
